title: Jaish-e-Mohammed
summary: Jaish-e-Mohammed (Urdu: جيش محمد‎, literally "The Army of Muhammad", abbreviated as JeM) is a  Pakistan-based[11] Deobandi[3] Jihadist[3][5][12] Mujahideen group active in Kashmir which is widely considered as a terrorist group.[13] The group's primary motive is to separate Kashmir from India and merge it into Pakistan.
